ControlLogic

类 ControlLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • ControlLogic.ControlLogic
  • 直接已知子类:
    AIControl, PlayerControl

    public class ControlLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    class ContrilLogic is to define the control method of a certain aircraft including the setting of the Radar and Infared System, switching of weapon and aircraft operation such as turning and trim Its Subclass include PlayerControl and AIControl
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected int CommandOrder 
      protected ExternalLoad CurrentWeapon 
      private int CurrentWeaponPointer 
      protected double DetectRange 
      protected double HelmetDirection 
      protected boolean InfraredMode 
      protected InfraredModel infraredModel 
      protected Aircraft MyAircraft
      Attributes for ControlLogic DetectRange is the visual limit of a pilot, is defined to be 3000 CommandOrder is used to control Command guide missles
      protected boolean RadarMode 
      protected RadarModel radarModel 
      protected int totalCurrentWeapon

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CheckInfraredLock(Object object)
      This method is used to detect a object by Infrared system, which will be called by GameWindowController
      void Dive()
      Dive order is used to let the aircraft turning ClockWise(when turning clockwise, aoa is less than 0) this is implemented by decrease the attack angle(AOA) of aircraft, the lift coefficient is proportional to the angle of attack
      void Firing()
      This method is to implement the shooting of guns
      int getCommandOrder() 
      ExternalLoad getCurrentWeapon() 
      double getDetectRange() 
      double getHelmetDirection() 
      InfraredModel getInfraredModel() 
      Aircraft getMyAircraft() 
      PlayerDisplay getMyDisplay() 
      RadarModel getRadarModel() 
      int getTotalCurrentWeapon()
      This method is used to count the total amount of current weapon
      void HeadTurning(boolean CounterClockWise)
      This method is used to turning the helmet aimer
      void HelmetViewUpdate() 
      void InfraredViewUpdate() 
      boolean isInfraredMode() 
      boolean isRadarMode() 
      void Launch()
      This method is used to determine which externalload can launch and implement it
      void LogicImplement()
      This is classes implemented by its subClass, which need to be accessed by other class
      void LogicImplementWithInput(java.lang.String Code) 
      void MissleLaunchAudio()
      This method is used to play audio during missle launch
      void Observe(Aircraft aircraf) 
      void Pitch()
      Pitch order is used to let the aircraft turning counterClockWise(when turning counterClockWise, aoa is larger than 0) this is implemented by increase the attack angle(AOA) of aircraft, the lift coefficient is proportional to the angle of attack
      void RadarScan(Object object)
      This method is used to detect a object by radar, which will be called by GameWindowController Also it can implement the helmet aiming of Radar Guide missle if aircraft has such function
      void RadarViewUpdate() 
      void setAirBrake()
      Switch on or off the airbrake if this airplane has it it can help aircraft to slow down when it is flying
      void setCommandOrder(int commandOrder) 
      void setCurrentWeapon()
      Switch to next weapon
      void setInfraredMode()
      Turn on or turn off the infrared mode
      void setInfraredModel() 
      void setMaxViewPointer(int maxViewPointer) 
      void setMyAircraft(Aircraft myAircraft) 
      void setRadarMode()
      Turn on or turn off the Radar mode
      void setRadarModel() 
      void ThrottleDOWN()
      ThrottleDOWN() order is to decrease the throttle of aircraft when throttle is at 0, use this order can open the brake if this plane is on the ground
      void ThrottleUP()
      ThrottleUP() order is to increase the throttle of aircraft when throttle is at 100, use this order can open the afterburn if this plane has it
      void Trim()
      Trim order is to stay the aircraft in level flight it is implemented by setting AOA to a certain value, which can make the total normal force of the aircraft balanced

      • RadarScan

        public void RadarScan(Object object)
        This method is used to detect a object by radar, which will be called by GameWindowController Also it can implement the helmet aiming of Radar Guide missle if aircraft has such function
        参数:
        object - the object which is detected

      • CheckInfraredLock

        public void CheckInfraredLock(Object object)
        This method is used to detect a object by Infrared system, which will be called by GameWindowController
        参数:
        object - the object which is detected

      • HeadTurning

        public void HeadTurning(boolean CounterClockWise)
        This method is used to turning the helmet aimer
        参数:
        CounterClockWise - It is true if the order is turning counterClockWise

      • MissleLaunchAudio

        public void MissleLaunchAudio()
        This method is used to play audio during missle launch

      • Launch

        public void Launch()
        This method is used to determine which externalload can launch and implement it

      • Firing

        public void Firing()
        This method is to implement the shooting of guns

      • Pitch

        public void Pitch()
        Pitch order is used to let the aircraft turning counterClockWise(when turning counterClockWise, aoa is larger than 0) this is implemented by increase the attack angle(AOA) of aircraft, the lift coefficient is proportional to the angle of attack

      • Dive

        public void Dive()
        Dive order is used to let the aircraft turning ClockWise(when turning clockwise, aoa is less than 0) this is implemented by decrease the attack angle(AOA) of aircraft, the lift coefficient is proportional to the angle of attack

      • Trim

        public void Trim()
        Trim order is to stay the aircraft in level flight it is implemented by setting AOA to a certain value, which can make the total normal force of the aircraft balanced

      • ThrottleUP

        public void ThrottleUP()
        ThrottleUP() order is to increase the throttle of aircraft when throttle is at 100, use this order can open the afterburn if this plane has it

      • ThrottleDOWN

        public void ThrottleDOWN()
        ThrottleDOWN() order is to decrease the throttle of aircraft when throttle is at 0, use this order can open the brake if this plane is on the ground

      • setAirBrake

        public void setAirBrake()
        Switch on or off the airbrake if this airplane has it it can help aircraft to slow down when it is flying

      • LogicImplement

        public void LogicImplement()
        This is classes implemented by its subClass, which need to be accessed by other class
